description: Bridges: Method create() must have `public function create<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer;` signature.
Bridges: Method delete() must have `public function delete<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionDeleteCriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer;` signature.
